text: @chrislhayes @sherrilee7 Wash, rinse, repeat. Trump is a media hound especially when he can use it to play to his tribe, his #MAGA. He rocked all the way to the W/House with earned media and those rally’s.He’s doing same thing using the CoronaVirus as his excuse to command the coverage of his propaganda.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
